name: Gravity Commando
description:
The year is 2091, the Earth’s gravity has been irreversibly split. As authorities scramble to adapt to this new reality, a technological arms race begins. In a bid for power the mob kills any scientist unwilling to work for them and build their arsenal. Unfortunately for them, one of their victims had a son. A son who built a robot capable of riding grav streams and kicking ass. His name... Gravity Commando!

Credits:

Game Designer and Programmer: Alexis Martineau

Narrative Design: Sophie Artemigi

Composers: Aaron King, Adrian Cermak

Producer: Jean De Wilde d'Estmael

Sound Design: Sam Morris

Marketing and PR: Julia Trawinska

UI Design: Aisosa Ugiagbe

Find out more at: https://www.alexismartineau.com/gravity-commando

This game was created as a submission for the Final Year Project of the NFTS games design and development MA.

Note: This build has not been tested on a wide range of machines

If you notice any bugs please fill out the form here: 

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd5b1i4g5aHB2t7PNKjHgAhSal0fXOroYxKNPUd...

Thanks for playing!
